CustomField.description: This field maps the Voice Call Issue from the Einstein work summary and addresses the Text Area constraints that prevent direct mapping to the Subject field. It is a temporary field and will be reviewed and removed in a subsequent release of the CST program
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field maps the Voice Call Issue from the Einstein work summary and addresses the Text Area constraints that prevent direct mapping to the Subject field. It is a temporary field and will be reviewed and removed in a subsequent release of the CST program
CustomField.label: Issue
